code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../contexts/AuthContext';import{Button,IconButton,Menu,MenuItem}from'@mui/material';import MenuIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Menu';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function Header(){const{user,logout}=useContext(AuthContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const[anchorEl,setAnchorEl]=React.useState(null);const handleMenu=event=>{setAnchorEl(event.currentTarget);};const handleClose=()=>{setAnchorEl(null);};const handleLogout=()=>{logout();navigate('/auth');handleClose();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{component:Link,to:"/",startIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuIcon,{}),children:"Home"}),user&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{component:Link,to:"/users",startIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuIcon,{}),children:"Users"}),!user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>navigate('/auth'),startIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuIcon,{}),children:"Login"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:handleMenu,style:{marginLeft:'auto'},children:user.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Menu,{anchorEl:anchorEl,open:Boolean(anchorEl),onClose:handleClose,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{component:Link,to:`/users/${user.id}`,onClick:handleClose,children:"Profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{onClick:handleClose,children:"Update"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]})]})]});}
